text: (visvasavantayini!) dharmaya pahala karanu læbuvangen kavurun allahvada avasana dinayada visvasa nokarada, allahda ohuge dutayada tahanam karanu læbu dæya sudusu nætæyi yanna adahas nokarada, mema satya dharmaya anugamanaya nokara sitinnoda, ovun (tamange) atvalin yatahatva jisya (namæti kappam) gevana turu oba ovun samaga yuddha karanu
